data.actual_result: Entry extends past the bottom of the screen
data.expected_result: Entry doesn't extend past the bottom of the screen
data.short_description: After scrolling to the very last entry in the audit log, the entry hides behind the bottom of the screen a little bit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that has multiple audit logs and you can view the audit logs - Scroll all the way to the bottom of the audit log - Observe the bottom entry - Slide the bottom entry up slowly, observing the bottom of the entry at the bottom of the screen
